discussion.author: xijiang
discussion.text:
QTL is the acronym for Quantitative Trait Loci. This is a cornerstone of breeding and genetics. Many related functions will be included in this package. If the name is now unique in the registry, and possible, I prefer this package name. 

Also,
- I just name the git repo to QTL.jl
- I also used qtl as my pen name for hundreds of readers.

Regards,
